snippet: Marilyn B. Tavenner, administrator of the federal Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, helped oversee the rollout of changes in the health care system.
abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services administrator Marilyn B Tavenner, who supervised rollout of changes in health care system, announces that she is stepping down.
lead_paragraph: Marilyn B. Tavenner, administrator of the federal Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, helped oversee the rollout of changes in the health care system.

headline.main: Official Who Led Medicare Through Insurance Shakeup Is Resigning
